name: Temporal Linking
passage: The Apollo 11 mission landed on the moon on July 20, 1969. Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin walked on the lunar surface.
question: When did the Apollo 11 mission land on the moon?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The Wright brothers achieved the first powered flight on December 17, 1903, in Kitty Hawk, North Carolina.
question: When was the first powered flight by the Wright brothers?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The Titanic sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on April 15, 1912, after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage.
question: When did the Titanic sink?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his famous 'I Have a Dream' speech on August 28, 1963, during the March on Washington.
question: When did Martin Luther King Jr. deliver the 'I Have a Dream' speech?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The Berlin Wall, which had divided East and West Berlin since 1961, was officially opened on November 9, 1989.
question: When was the Berlin Wall opened?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The Declaration of Independence was adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4, 1776.
question: When was the Declaration of Independence adopted?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The first iPhone was released by Apple on June 29, 2007, revolutionizing the smartphone industry.
question: When was the first iPhone released?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The French Revolution, a period of social and political upheaval in France, began in 1789.
question: When did the French Revolution begin?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa in the early 16th century, around 1503 to 1506.
question: When was the Mona Lisa painted?

name: Temporal Linking
passage: The signing of the Armistice on November 11, 1918, marked the end of World War I.
question: When was the Armistice that ended World War I signed?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: John started working at the company in 2010. Three years later, he was promoted to manager.
question: When was John promoted to manager?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: The warranty on my laptop expired last June. I bought it two years before that.
question: When did you buy the laptop?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: Emma won the science fair in her final year of high school, which was a year after she created her winning project.
question: When did Emma create her project?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: The old church was renovated a decade ago. It was originally built five decades earlier.
question: When was the church originally built?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: They moved to a new house a month before their second child was born.
question: When did they move to the new house in relation to their second child's birth?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: The library was closed for renovation shortly after the new year and reopened six months later.
question: When did the library reopen?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: Linda visited Paris during her summer vacation and then went to Rome two weeks later.
question: When did Linda visit Rome?
answer: Two weeks after her Paris visit

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: The museum exhibition opened last week and will run until the end of next month.
question: How long will the museum exhibition run?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: Tom graduated a year before his sister did. She graduated in 2018.
question: When did Tom graduate?

name: Relative Time Expressions
passage: The company celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2000, ten years after moving to its current headquarters.
question: When did the company move to its current headquarters?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: While Maria was attending a conference in Paris, her colleague John was presenting their project in Berlin.
question: What was happening when Maria was attending the conference?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: The festival started just as the sun was setting.
question: What was occurring as the sun was setting?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: During the time Alex was studying in the library, Emma was working in the laboratory.
question: What was Emma doing while Alex was studying?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: As the new year rang in, the city's fireworks display lit up the sky.
question: What event occurred as the new year was ringing in?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: While the students were taking their final exams, their teacher was grading the previous tests.
question: What was the teacher doing as the students took their finals?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: The thunderstorm hit the town at the same time the concert was supposed to start.
question: What happened when the concert was supposed to start?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: As the CEO was announcing the new product, the company's stock began to rise.
question: What was occurring as the CEO announced the new product?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: During the week that the international summit was held, the local universities hosted various cultural events.
question: What was happening during the international summit week?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: While the family was vacationing in Hawaii, their neighbors were looking after their pets.
question: What were the neighbors doing while the family was in Hawaii?

name: Synchronous Events
passage: As the clock struck midnight, people around the world celebrated the new year.
question: What occurred as the clock struck midnight?
